data.title: The Marriott Rocked!
data.text: We stayed here so my husband & son could see the Widespread Panic Show at the  Riverside Theater. I got to watch the Cubs clench the series in the Bar! The whole family had a great night! We were here from Florida for a wedding and downtown Milwaukee was just beautiful to us. Thanks for a great stay!

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

First and foremost, thank you for choosing the Marriott Milwaukee Downtown!  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to be able to serve you again the next time you are in Milwaukee!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good location & customer service
data.text: A full-service Marriott with updated rooms and postive customer service, great downtown Milwaukee location with easy access to local highways. Rooms are spacious, modern, with positive amenities. Restaurant and bar located on main floor. Self-parking or valet available. Walking distance to numerous restaurants and SummerFest grounds.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for staying with us recently!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the customer service that our team provided to you.  We hope that the next time you are in Milwaukee, we have the opportunity to serve you again!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Does the Job
data.text: It's in a great spot and it's exactly what you would expect. Clean, nice rooms. Nice lobby. Safe neighborhood - great for walking around. I had some issues checking in my service dog - I forgot my paperwork at home but after a small struggle they allowed him in. Make sure to remember that paperwork! They have parking on the side of the building - if I remember correctly they gave me a piece of paper to put in my windshield to let people know I was staying at the Marriott. And it was a great price!

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for staying with us recently and taking the time to provide feedback about your stay!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall and that you found the location safe and close to plenty of things to do.  Please come again soon!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Terrific downtown Milwaukee stay
data.text: My husband and I chose the Marriott because we were intrigued with how they had renovated this historic building. I stay at Marriotts frequently when I travel for work, and I'm pleased to report the same quality is there for personal visits. Nice, personal service from the front desk, and Oliver, our server at the adjoining Milioke restaurant was charming. We were here to celebrate my birthday, and they made me feel very special!

owner_response.author: , Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay at the Milwaukee Marriott Downtown.  As a valued guest, we appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations. 

Your feedback is integral to our ability to continue to improve our service. Thank you again for your time and come visit us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Packers Game
data.text: Stayed here with some friends for a Packers and Bears Game. Great location, fantastic service and big comfy clean rooms and beds. On site bar and restaurant a plus. Staff was extremely helpful in getting us information on the area and attractions and shared a great idea about linking up with a local pub to get to and from the game. Great stay, Enjoy!

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

First and foremost, thank you for choosing to stay with us for the Packers/Bears game this past Thursday night!  We are happy to hear that you found our hotel to be an excellent choice for your trip, and hope to be able to serve you again the next time you are in Milwaukee!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pre-Wedding eval
data.text:
Wife and I traveled to Milwaukee in prep for a weeding planned for 10/2017. Looking for rooms to reserve or recommend for out of town guests to stay nearby the 3rd ward venue. 

Base rate quoted as $239/ night. With taxes, valet parking etc, $309.

Very convenient to the lakefront, entertainment venues and & 3rd ward.

Room was clean, ready and well appointed. Front desk and lobby bar staff were friendly and helpful. View was depressing from that side of the bldg.

Valet attendants were prompt and efficient, but pricey @ $35.

Overall a good experience but too expensive to have to keep the curtains drawn. Will assess the  Hilton Garden Inn next.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

First and foremost, thank you for choosing us the last time you were in Milwaukee.  We are pleased to hear that you overall found our hotel to be clean, well-maintained and that our team provided excellent service.  I would like to personally apologize for the view that you had from your room.  We would love the opportunity to serve you again in the future and would be happy to try and accommodate you with a better view.

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Football Weekend
data.text:
Stayed three nights at this hotel.  This property caters to the business traveler, but it was perfect for the 12 family members who came to town for a Green Bay Packers vs Dallas Cowboys football game. The MKE airport is a 15 minute Uber ride away. The hotel is also a short walk to the "Third Ward" neighborhood where there is an indoor farmers market and numerous bars, outdoor cafes and bistros as well as boutique shopping. 

The hotel appears to have been recently redone. Lobby and public areas were clean, bright and comfortable. Our room was a bit small but clean and comfortable, with a walk-in, tile shower and good amenities. Beds and linens were excellent. The club lounge was comfortable and the free breakfast food quality was a step up from other business chains.  Breakfast included scrambled eggs, bacon/sausage, hot and cold cereal, fresh fruit and yogurt. There was an excellent super automatic coffee machine that made fresh ground coffee and espresso or latte coffee, (not preground K-cups), and also had a separate steamer-frother. You can, of course, make fresh hot tea. An Afternoon Happy Hour was also available on Mondays through Thursdays. As we were there over a weekend, we did not utilize it. The  hotel, staff was amazing. Helped us with storing our tailgating food and drinks. The hotel restaurant was very good. We had drinks and appetizers there our first night. The grilled chicken wings were excellent. I like a bit of "char"  on my wings. The pretzel and cheese dip was great too. I would recommend this hotel.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for staying with us recently while you were in town for the Packers v. Cowboys game!  We are happy that you chose us for you and your family members and are also delighted to hear that your experience was an excellent one.  We hope to be able to serve you again soon!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Perfect!
data.text:
We visited the Milwaukee Marriott today for a business project and had a group lunch to debrief the session afterwards in the restaurant, Millioke.

The food was good but the service was exceptional. Our waitress Ingrid was attentive and responsive and catered to our fairly large group in a very professional manner. So much so that I was compelled to write this review.

Great job, Marriott! And thank you Ingrid!

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for staying with us!  We are delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and hope to be able to serve you again soon!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very comfortable and convenient.
data.text: First time staying in downtown Milwaukee and I was very happy with the Marriott. It's location makes it convenient to the lake front, river walk and Third Ward. All within walking distance. The rooms were very comfortable and quiet. I was there for an event and the staff working the event were all outstanding! The front desk people were very helpful and the bar/restaurant was clean, spacious, had several TV's for sports, and the service and food were really good as well. Getting to and from the airport was simple as well. This property is a definitely a good choice for downtown Milwaukee.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good afternoon,

First and foremost, thank you for staying with us recently and taking the time to provide feedback about your time with us!  We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable time here at the Milwaukee Marriott and that you found the team to be pleasant and helpful!  We hope that you come again soon!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Disappointingly bland
data.text:
Stayed here with family for a wedding. 

It's pretty standard as far as Marriotts go. The room sizes were typical for US standards. It was so standard that it lacked any sort of personality what so ever. It was rather a disappointing experience overall

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good afternoon,

Thank you for staying with us recently and providing your feedback about your stay.  We would like to apologize that you did not have an excellent experience with us and found our hotel to lack personality.  We will be sure to examine our operation to see if we can make changes to make our hotel stand out more in the world of Marriott.  

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Centrally located, good Marriott
data.text: The hotel is located so that it is an easy walk east to the Art Museum and an easy walk south to the Historic Third Ward and Public Market.  You can also walk to the Riverwalk, which goes along the Milwaukee River and then to Lake Michigan, and is a pleasant walk.  Service is good and the rooms are a decent size. There aren't many places to eat on Wisconsin Avenue, mainly a few sandwich shops and the hotel restaurant, but there are more up the streets crossing Wisconsin, and in the  Historic Third Ward, including in the Public Market.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning!

Thank you for staying with us recently!  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our location to be ideal for your travels.  Please visit us again soon!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel near downtown
data.text:
We stayed for 2 nights for a wedding nearby. This hotel was walking distance to the lakefront area & restaurants/bars. 

This is a nice hotel with a restaurant & bar off the lobby. The room was spacious & clean. It would be nicer if the bathroom was bigger. Plus the cold water in the bathroom sink was abnormally loud when you turned on the faucet.

You have to request a mini fridge if you want one in your room. I was disappointed that there were no pay per view movies. If you have hulu or netflix though you can log into your own account & watch for free. Unfortunately i do not have those.

The gym was bigger than some hotel gyms I have seen, & I had the place all to myself. 

Overall this is a nice hotel in a good location.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for choosing the Milwaukee Marriott Downtown!  We are happy that you found our location to be ideal, and also that the room and restaurant/bar were to your liking.  We are sorry that we do not offer some of the amenities that you wish to see in a hotel, and that the water faucet in the bathroom was loud.  We will ensure that we check into the loud water faucet to fix this problem moving forward.  Our hope that is these incidents do not deter you from staying with us in the future as we would love to have the opportunity to serve you again!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Impressed!
data.text: Initially, it was the location that attracted me to this hotel. Upon entering, I was greeted immediately and felt welcomed. The employee at the check in desk was very helpful, friendly, and even offered suggestions of nearby attractions and things to do. The hotel is extremely clean, beautifully decorated, high-end, and well-maintained. It's a fairly new hotel and is just absolutely stunning inside. I was impressed by how clean everything was and how kind the employees walking around were. It was nice to know that there were people around to offer assistance or help if needed.

owner_response.author: Dustin K, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for staying with us recently and taking the time to provide feedback on your stay!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience here and that you found the hotel to be clean, well-maintained, and full of service oriented team members.  We hope that we are able to serve you again the next time you are in Milwaukee!

Yours in Hospitality,

Dustin Kovats
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stay
data.text: My husband and I met friends from Baton Rouge in Milwaukee for the LSU v. Wisconsin football game in Green Bay over the Labor Day weekend. We could not have asked for nicer accommodations. The rooms were newly decorated, the bed was very comfortable and there was a complimentary breakfast every morning on the second floor. Valet parking was convenient at $33.00 per night but well worth the price. Staff was friendly and helpful and the hotel is just a few blocks away from many wonderful restaurants. Beautiful city! If you're staying in downtown Milwaukee, I recommend this hotel very highly.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the recommendation and for allowing us to serve you and your friends.  We are so glad you found the accommodations to exceed your expectations and certainly appreciate your patronage.  We hope to see you on your next trip to Milwaukee!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Stay!
data.text: We visited Milwaukee for the first time and stayed at the Milwaukee Marriott Downtown.  The hotel is a close walk to the the river and not too far of a walk to the lake.  The staff was excellent and the room was spacious.  We will definitely be back.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for stay with us and for your kind words about the hotel.  We sincerely appreciate it and look forward to your next visit!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good for the business traveler
data.text: Nice rooms very clean.  Breakfast at the hotel good, not standard hotel buffet, cooked to order, Starbucks there also.  The hotel attached to a mall with many business destinations included in the mall.  Was able to get to many restaurants adjacent to the mall without going out in the weather, very convenient.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your experience!  There may be some confusion as to our location as we are not connected to a mall, but we certainly appreciate the kind words and are very glad you enjoyed your time in Milwaukee.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: 39th Anniversary weekend
data.text: We celebrated our 39th Anniversary in Milwaukee WI and our stay at the Milwaukee Marriott Downtown only added to a great weekend.  The staff was attentive to our comfort and we were surprised to find a chilled bottle of champagne and appetizers waiting for us in our room when we returned from a day of exploring.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Happy Anniversary and thank you for celebrating with us!  We were honored to be a part of your special day!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Details
data.text: All of the staff consistently made our time there worth every penny. From Kim our group planner to Carrieann at the front desk. They have a very nice on site restaurant, covert to everything downtown and just off the river.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for staying with us and for the kind endorsement!  We are so glad everything came together as expected and sincerely appreciate the opportunity to serve you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Super in every way
data.text:
Great location for anything downtown and easy access to main roads.
They whole staff here was the most friendly and helpful I have ever come across!
Valet team fast and excellent directions.King room was roomy and very clean. Bar had 20 plus beers on tap alone! Kudos to management who installs in every members of the team to treat guests with sincere friendliness. Love this place.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We sincerely appreciate having you as our guest and are even more grateful you have taken the time to share your experience with others!   Thank you so much!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Exceptional Service!!
data.text:
Our daughter had her wedding reception at the Marriott along with many guests staying there. Audrey & Carly were wonderful to work with!!  Their attention to details and response time to questions was prompt.  As the wedding weekend arrived, Dan ( bellman) greeted us warmly and was expecting our arrival.  I didn't realize I had left my cell phone in the car but Dan noticed.  He retrieved the phone and found me. Ameerah (housekeeper) was wonderful to accommodate the timing of cleaning our room with everyone coming and going.  She left us such a sweet note telling us to have a great time & enjoy the day.  Carly was so helpful in finding us a bigger waste paper basket for our suite on short notice and had one delivered promptly to meet our needs.  All these little things is what makes this Marriott exceptional!!!  

The wedding reception went off without any glitches.  The food was so delicious and the room was stunning!!  Carly checked on us several times throughout the evening to see if we were in need of anything.  I would definitely recommend this Marriott to anyone for any small or large events.

owner_response.author: GeneralManager2740, General Manager at Milwaukee Marriott Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience!    We are so happy that everyone enjoyed the evening on such a festive occasion.   It was sincerely a pleasure to be of service and we are honored that we were able to be part of such a significant day.  THANK YOU!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
